title: Evaluation of a novel particle-based assay for detecting SLE-related autoantibodies
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Daniel Lorca-Arce, Albert Pérez-Isidro, Judit Becerra, Maria José Martínez, Noemí De Moner, Roberto Ríos-Garcés, Sergio Prieto-González, Gerard Espinosa, Ricard Cervera, Carmen Andalucía, Odette Viñas-Gomis, Estibaliz Ruiz-Ortiz
